paper_abstract: This paper presents our vision of the Web of Things, where real world objects and cloud services interact through the web. In this prospect, mechanisms to embody object-as-a-service, along with novel navigation and interaction paradigms are needed to enable common physical objects in the surroundings to be considered as new stakeholders in traditional web applications. (C) 2011 Alcatel-Lucent.
paper_title: The Web of Things Vision: Things as a Service and Interaction Patterns
